body_html:
I have no problem moving it to a contribute section, but I would still like to keep the same context:
sgd_op = tf.train.GradientDescentOptimizer(3.0).maximize(value, global_step, [var0, var1])

I will try to inherit Optimizer and add the maximize() function. Is that acceptable?
